verses.roman:
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paḍe prabhu āchāḍa khāñā
dekhi' śacīmātā kahe rodana kariyā

synonyms: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe—very frequently; paḍe—falls; prabhu—the Lord; āchāḍa khāñā—tumbling down; dekhi'-seeing; śacī-mātā—mother Śacī; kahe—says; rodana kariyā—crying.
translation: Frequently the Lord would tumble to the ground. Seeing this, mother Śacī would cry.
